skill_1: Increases all alliesREPLACEEMYOHEMMIN damage by 25% for 8 seconds.
skill_2: Increase all alliesREPLACEEMYOHEMMIN rate of fire and accuracy by 5% for every 4 seconds that SAA is alive in battle. Max 3 stacks.
formation_bonus: Affects ALL\r\nIncreases damage by 24%\r\nIncreases accuracy by 60%

skill_1: Launch a grenade that deals 16x damage to enemies within a radius of 1.5.
skill_2: If Anti-Personnel Grenade kills the main target, deal 3x damage to enemies within a radius of 4.\r\nIf Anti-Personnel Grenade does not kill the main target, deal 0,6x damage every 0.5 second and increase the damage taken by the target by 20% for 3 seconds.
